scripts.serve: node -e "const http=require('http'),fs=require('fs'),path=require('path'); http.createServer((req,res)=>{const file=req.url==='/'?'index.html':req.url.slice(1); const filePath=path.join(__dirname,file); if(fs.existsSync(filePath)){const ext=path.extname(file); const contentType={'html':'text/html','css':'text/css','js':'text/javascript','md':'text/markdown'}[ext.slice(1)]||'text/plain'; res.writeHead(200,{'Content-Type':contentType}); res.end(fs.readFileSync(filePath));} else {res.writeHead(404); res.end('File not found');}}).listen(3000,()=>// Removed console.log);"
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.watch: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),{exec}=require('child_process'); // Removed console.log fs.watch(__dirname,(event,filename)=>{if(filename&&filename.endsWith('.md')){// Removed console.log exec('npm run build',(err)=>{if(err) console.error(err); else // Removed console.log});}});"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo '🚀 جاهز للنشر - ارفع محتوى المجلد إلى الخادم'
